issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

fixVersions.description: Maintenance release with new AMQP support and smaller modules

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

versions.description: Maintenance release with new AMQP support and smaller modules

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description:

comments.body: Fixed, the subscribe to the request destination was missing a receipt request so in the topic case we could miss the request message.
